MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA16 postcode area of Greenock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:31pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair the damaged roadside pillar outside 79 Mavis Road affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:52 PM on Monday, 11 January 2021.
